name: DvDrum, Ultimate Drum Simulator!
summary:
DvDrum, Ultimate Drum Simulator! is Sandbox Drum Simulator that allows to build and customize your Drumkits and play them in a realistic and funny drummer experience.  
 
Everything is customizable, from drumkits to sounds and inputs maps. Collect and manage your drumkits and play them with drumless tracks, included, or load your own track. Broadcast or record and share your drumming performance! Expand your DvDrum with new items by Workshop or share your with in-game intuitive Workshop menus! 
 
DvDrum is for Everyone! It allows to learn to play drums in very short time while having fun! 20 Drumless tracks inside from easy to hard skill level to help you to learn. DvDrum offers both relaxing and adrenalinic gameplay experience.

name: DVR Simulator
summary: DVR Simulator is a Drone Racing FPV Simulator. Learn how to fly or start training right now with racing or freestyle modes. Do you have a VR headset? Use it to simulate FPV Goggles!

name: DvG: Conquering Giants
summary: DvG is an imaginative twist on the classic story of David vs Goliath where you are the shepherd boy, armed with a simple, yet powerful sling, facing off versus the giant Goliath and all his minions.

name: Dvorec
summary: DVOREC is a game inspired by the loud investigation of someone whose name should not be called. Find yourself in the center of political events, international scandals and simply relax in the aquadiskotheque on the territory of the "hotel", completely recreated according to the drawings.

name: Dvergatal: Thorin's Quest
summary: Save the world from the curse of the Spider King.

name: DVD Karaoke Game DVT-G100
summary: Tectoy's DVD Karaoke Game DVT-G100 is a DVD player, a karaoke machine and a dedicated console all built in one single machine. It comes with two six-button controllers and was marketed to include 100 built-in SEGA Master System and Game Gear games, though the total sum is 102 when counting 20 games for 20 em 1 and 10 games for Pense Bem.

name: DVD Dancemachine DVT-F800
summary:
Tectoy's DVD Dancemachine DVT-F800 is a DVD player, a karaoke machine and a dedicated console all built in one single machine. It comes with one gamepad identical to the original SEGA Master System controller and a dance pad. It has 4 buit-in games, two played with the dance pad and two with the gamepad; each game has five songs and three difficulty levels. The included games are:

Let´s Dance: a dance game to be played by one or two players with the dance pad.

Movin': a singing and dance game for up to 4 players. In doubles, one player sings and the other dances according to the patterns shown on screen.

Rock Show: a game similar to Guitar Hero, but instead of using a guitar controller the player uses the gamepad to press the notes as they scroll down the screen.

Beat Game: a game for up to four players. In doubles, one player sings and the other plays the selected instrument (guitar, drums or keyboards) using the gamepad.

name: Dvalloc
summary: Explore a vast, underground world filled with secrets, intense fights and challenging platforming. Defeat cursed rune's corruption and help a dwarven village return to its former self, all while admiring stunning pixelart visuals. Are you ready to become Dvalloc the dwarf?

name: D-Virus: Evil Menance
summary:
D-Virus: Evil Menance is a short RPG made with RPG Maker MV to participate in the Major Jam, whose theme was Cosmic.

Playing as Melissa Casanova, you must use the power of your HERZ to fight against a deadly virus that spread through the Wittelsbach spaceship. The HERZ is the only way to fight these demons!

name: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition
summary: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition is an update for D-Virus: Evil Menance that completely improves the game and adds new content.

name: D+Vine[Luv]
summary:
D+Vine[Luv] (pronounced Divine Love) is a typical J-RPG, using a top-down perspective with a slightly isometric representation, which also utilizes visual novel segments for adventure elements.

Unlike the original PC (Windows) version released almost two years earlier, the Dreamcast port does not feature any adult content.

name: D+Vine[Luv]
summary:
"Even at the cost of my life—there is someone I want to protect."

It is said that there once existed a civilization on this earth more advanced than the current one. This rich civilization was built using the power of "magic" granted by the spirits. However, this long-lasting civilization rapidly declined after the spirits disappeared and eventually perished.

There were those who were interested in this ancient world. The protagonist, Hyde, travels around the world seeking the legacy of the old world. During his journey, he happens to visit the town of Arville. There, he hears rumors that something resembling ancient ruins has been found in a nearby cave. Hyde heads to the cave and meets a girl who holds the key to the truth.

The game was developed over a period of more than two years. It features a wealth of content, including around 800 types of items and modes where the enemies' strength is doubled or tripled, providing substantial replay value.

Unlike the original PC (Windows) version released almost two years earlier, the Dreamcast port does not feature any adult content. A couple of years later, DVD PG Edition release came out which also includes adult content.

name: DVD Store Simulator
summary: Run a vintage DVD shop! Sell games, figures, board games. Interact with customers, make special collections. Find rare DVDs from the traveller in front of your shop. Grow your shop with online orders and events. Hire staff, manage stock, expand your shop. Live the passion of collecting!

name: Dverghold
summary: When the Dwarves of Dverghold awakened something ancient beneath the isle of Rekestt, King Sterren sent word across the Shattered Sea: brave the haunted depths, or let the darkness rise. Oldschool dungeon crawler with turn-based combat and atmospheric soundtrack by Dungeon Synth artist Splendorius.
